description: These earbuds bring the bass and the fashion all at once. Bright, flashy color matched with high-performance speakers make for a earbud you'll never want to take out. Works with any 3.5mm plug-in. iLuv Creative Technology, the premier provider of the most comprehensive accessories line for the Apple and smartphone markets, rapidly delivers award winning products for today's discriminating consumers. Since inception, iLuv has amassed an impressive total of 16 prestigious CES Innovations awards, recognized for design and engineering in the Portable Multimedia Accessories, Headphones and the In-Vehicle Accessory categories. Headquartered in New York, iLuv is a division of jWIN Electronics Corp., a leading consumer electronics company since 1997. All iLuv products are conceived, designed and developed in New York and continue to lead in quality, value, design and innovation.
title: iLuv iEP322BLK City Lights In-Ear Earphones - Ultra Bass - Black (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
